definition: lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: There is no effort when he plays. He scores goals and plays beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 他踢得是行云流水，他进球还踢的很漂亮。

sentences.english: Brazilian football is an attacking, free-flowing style of play.
sentences.chinese: 巴西足球擅长进攻，行云流水自成一格。

sentences.english: Germany’s new, fluid tactics shattered France’s armies.
sentences.chinese: 德国崭新的，行云流水般的战术击溃了法国的军队。

sentences.english: He swims easily in the stream of his own temperament.
sentences.chinese: 他将自己的气质秉性挥洒自如，如行云流水。

sentences.english: Back office, be freely flowing style of writing scenery, soft and moist beat.
sentences.chinese: 背影处，行云流水风光霁月，柔软湿润的跳动着。

sentences.english: Youthful steps such as flowing clouds, the youth need knowledge and nourishing.
sentences.chinese: 青春的脚步如行云流水，青春的岁月需要常识的滋养。

definition: to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
quick and skillful/agile
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
graceful/elegant/to drift/to float
flowing (of speech, writing)/fluent/smooth and easy
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
warms the heart and delights the eye (idiom)/pleasing/delightful
squeaky clean/neat and tidy/efficient
adept/skilled
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
calm/unruffled
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
comfortable/enjoyable/relaxed
deft/nimble/ingenious
